Info & Training



  • The link below will take you to the FAA Training and Testing website:

    > FAA Training and Testing



  • I need more help, how can I chat with support?

    You can Call or E-mail us anytime by going to the "Contact Tab". Video confrencing is available if an issue cannot be resolved by phone or email.

    * Contact us to set up a video appointment.



  • Available Commands . .

    SPD - Adjusts speed value displayed in flight marker datablock.

    *Should be entered as an integer value between 0 and 999.

    ALT - Adjusts altitude value displayed in flight marker datablock.

    *Should be entered as an integer value between 0 and 999.

    HDG - Adjusts heading value dislpayed in flight marker datablock. Reorients flight marker.

    *Should be entered as an integer value betewen 0 and 360 inclusive.



  • Example For Available Commands . .

    Commands should be entered in the following format:

    CALLSIGN COMMAND VALUE



    To change the heading of flight with call sign N7601S to a bearing of 105 degrees:

    N7601S HDG 105



    Type command into the command box at bottom left of screen and click submit or press enter to execute the command.



  • On Screen Keyboard . .

    The keyboard button can be used to display an on screen keyboard for command input.



  • Toggle Airport Markers . .

    The (Toggle Airport Icons Button) is used to toggle the local airport markers on and off the screen. The Map can be adjusted before, during and after simulation.



  • Pause and Resume . .

    The pause button will freeze all active flight markers on the screen until the resume button is clicked.



  • Pending Flights . .

    The pending flights window will populate with pending flights data after the chosen Scenario is loaded. Click a flight scenario to load the flights. *If there is no pending flight data shown, zero flights will launch.



  • Launch Sim . .

    Click the "Launch Sim Button" to Launch the Pending Flights. Launched Flights should be visable on Map. *You can reset the Sim at any time by clicking "Reset" or simply refreshing the page.
